column1: Description of Association Member Benefit Package
Medical Bill Repricing $25 Prepay Doctor Visits
Reference Based Pricing Reducing Medical Providers Rates
Advocacy/Concierge Service Personal help in navigating your health plan, filing claims and repricing network reductions
No Cost Virtual Doctor Visits Unlimited Virtual Doctor Consultations
FREE Prescription Club 90% of Most Commonly Prescribed Medications FREE!
Prescription Program - Discount prescription card that can be used at over 60,000 pharmacies nationwide and will give members up to 60% discounts on their prescription medications.
Mail Order Pharmacy Savings of up to 80% on prescription medication, delivered free and to your doorstep.
Entertainment Package Theme Parks, Movie Tickets, Vacation Packages, Cruise Excursions, Airline Tickets, Car Rental, Ski Lodge, Disney World, Six Flags, Sea World
Direct Lab Testing Lab testing discounts of up to 80% . Blood tests of urine, hair, for virus, flu, covid, rashes, for disease identification. Starts as low as $5.00.
Pryor Learning Business training for communication, Excel, HR, leadership, Project Management, , certification in many professional fields.

MRI and CT Scans Members save 40% to 75% on usual charges for MRI and CT Scans at thousands of credentialed radiology centers nationwide. Members are referred to a certified radiologist based on condition, preferences and location.
Diabetic Supplies Members get 60% off average retail prices and free shipping on all packages, and an extra 15% off any single order item.
Medical Supplies Members who need medical supplies, such as bandages, beds, wheel chairs, walkers, oxygen tanks, etc. can save from 25% to 50% .
Online Health Manager Health aid diet planning, fitness training , food nutritional guidance, and much more.
Online Fitness & Nutrition Customized Fitness Program on-line, with personal trainers, progress monitoring, plan guides and nutrition plans.

Alternative Wellness 25% or more discounted service fees on Alternative Wellness Medicines and Services, such as: Physical Therapist, Chiropractor, Nutrition Counselor, Massage Therapist, Acupuncturist Herbal Medicine, Yoga Training, Tai Chi Schools
